alert.note: Alert for Belknap; Merrimack; Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 8:56AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern York, western Oxford, northwestern Cumberland, northwestern Strafford, Coos, eastern Grafton, Belknap, northeastern Merrimack and Carroll Counties through 930 AM EST... At 854 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms along a line extending from Maidstone to near Gilmanton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Dangerous cloud to ground lightning. Locations impacted include... Laconia, Conway, Berlin, Littleton, Bridgton, Lancaster, Fryeburg, Alfred, Bethel, Bethlehem, Colebrook, Lincoln, Moultonborough, Ossipee, Meredith, Alton, Hollis, Gilmanton, Holderness and Ashland. This includes Interstate 93 between mile markers 56 and 59, and between mile markers 105 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Belknap; Merrimack; Northern Carroll; Northern Coos; Northern Grafton; Southern Carroll; Southern Coos; Southern Grafton; Strafford
